response.overview: The 1970s. In a rich home in the wealthy suburbs, a group of men and women get together for several days to eat, dance and enjoy until they die.  Ideas on the menu  I chose the 1973 film of Ferreri, LA GRANDE BOUFFE, as the starting point of a reflection tinged with irony and sarcasm on the drifts and excesses of a consumer society, especially the ever-hungrier "digital" one... In fact, the film COPULENCE was generated by AI from original prompts and visuals from the Italian director's film. The online use of AI through the consumer platforms allows me to take stock of the limits of a creation subjected to pre-established, and thus normative models, as well as to play with the limits of a possible critique of an alienating system...
response.title: Copulence
